name: Ganga Zumba's Request
description:
Ganga Zumba's Request

This is the English version of A Serviço de Ganga Zumba.

Based on the adventure contained in the book "Mini GURPS: Quilombo dos Palmares", this is a text adventure set in Brazil in 1670, and the main characters are inhabitants of Quilombo dos Palmares.
